shortdesc.ph: Pauses the playback of the music file.
Pauses the playback of a music file.
Pauses the playback of the music file.
Pauses the playback of the music file.

section.p: After calling to play a music file, call this method to pause the playback. To stop playback, call .
After you call the method to play a music file, call this method to pause the playback. To stop the playback, call .
After you call the method to play a music file, call this method to pause the playback. To stop the playback, call .
After calling the method to play a music file, if you want to pause playback, call this method. If you want to stop playback, call .

section.title: Timing
section.p: You need to call this method after joining a channel.
You must call this method after joining a channel.
You must call this method after joining a channel.
You need to call this method after joining a channel.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
